Name: Rocky Mayhem
About the game: Rocky Mayhem is a hardcore space shooter inspired by the classic 'Asteroids' game. You play as a pilot, who has recently received distress calls from a fellow astronaut from Neptune. Your mission is to extract your colleague from the area but what you learn will shock you... Play through multiple levels and progress through the story to find out why your co-worker was lingering around Neptune and help save Earth from a potential attack.
